messages.title: Time is running out!
messages.content: The polls close at 10pm. Don't risk losing your vote by leaving it to the last minute. Go out and vote now! And remember. There are two choices here in Leyton & Wanstead: Labour or the Tories. Don't be tempted by either of the two irrelevant fringe parties. Keep Leyton & Wanstead Labour. Vote Labour, vote Cryer.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only John Cryer can beat the Tories here

contactInformation.address: John Cryer's Campaign Office 642 High Road Leytonstone, E11 3AA

leaflet.additionalNotes: If you have registered for a postal vote but have been unable to post it, you may still hand it in at the polling station up until 10pm today, Thursday 8 June.
